projectGridLines.title: Advanced Analytics and Data Science Internship
projectGridLines.description:
Indus Insights is a leading Data Science & Advanced Analytics consulting firm. We work with leading fintech firms, banks, payment companies, insurtech firms, and alternate lenders. We work on high-impact problems of our clients, helping create value for them using Data Science & Advanced Analytics. Our clients are spread across the globe, and we currently have clients in four continents. 

During your internship, you will work on live client engagements, in areas such as Marketing Analytics, Credit Risk Analytics, Customer Management, Pricing, etc. You will use large volumes of data and applied statistics to create meaningful insights for our clients, using techniques such as Machine Learning, Logistic Regression, Clustering & Segmentation, NPV/LTV modeling, etc. You will go through extensive training in tools, including

Excel, SQL, Python/R (Extensive training will be provided onsite during the internship) ,Ownership of deliverables, good communication skills, attention to detail

R, Python, MS-Excel, SQL, Tableau, MS-PowerPoint, and others. Candidates who do well in the internship will be given a Pre-Placement Offer (PPO) at the end of the internship.

At the completion of the internship, candidates would have the following learnings:

  1. Working knowledge of using data science and data analysis tools, such as SQL, Excel, Python, R
  2. Application of Data Science and Analytics in dynamic sectors such as Fintech, Insurtech, etc
